Frequently Asked Questions

How far in advance should I book?

We recommend booking at least 2-3 months in advance for the best availability and pricing.

Do you offer customized itineraries?

Absolutely! All our trips are 100% customizable to match your interests and budget.

What is your cancellation policy?

We offer flexible cancellation. Full refund if canceled 60+ days before travel.

Do I need a visa for Tanzania?

Most travelers need a visa. We can provide guidance on visa requirements for your country.

What vaccinations are required?

Consult your doctor. Yellow fever and malaria prevention are typically recommended.

What is the best time to visit?

June-October (dry season) is best for wildlife viewing. Year-round safaris are possible.
